title: First Step: Shop Foundation
description: Player selects initial shop layout, unlocks first display and transaction area.

title: Getting Started with Sales
description: Player completes their first sale and begins simple customer interactions.

title: Decor & Expansion
description: Unlocks decorative placement, grid system, and increases shop size.

title: Material Management
description: Unlocks the ability to manage and choose different metals and gem types.

title: Hiring Your First Assistant
description: Unlocks staff hiring system, allowing task delegation.

title: Photo Area Setup
description: Player unlocks photography zone to enhance marketing visuals.

title: Advanced Customer Preferences
description: Complex customer demands appear, requiring better match and price analysis.

title: Gem Cutting Mechanic
description: Unlocks gem shaping and polishing station.

title: Basic Design Mechanic
description: Unlocks early design interface with limited slot selection.

title: Special Customers Appear
description: Triggers narrative special customers with story-based orders.

title: Custom Orders and Events
description: Unlocks timed special events and custom-designed jewelry demands.

title: Full Design System
description: Unlocks complete design interface and player-crafted collections.
